input.sentences: the military cemeteries are full of fallen heroes .
a widow pays her respects to her fall husband .
she brings a folded flag | a symbol of what he fought and died for .
sometimes she will sit and spend some time at the cemetary to reflect .
but in the end | she knows she must eventually move on .
output.sentences: The rows of headstones stand as erect and well-arranged as the men they represent, as unbowed by the chill in the otherwise beautiful fall day.

The goose pimples raised by the cold air and the fallen leaves are nothing to Sylvia as she pays quiet tribute to her fallen husband with such a huge amount of pride and tenderness and loss in her heart.
The symbol of all that her Lietenant cherished, family, honor and country are bound in the stars and stripes she holds in her arms.
Sitting quietly, Sylvia imagines what she would say to Henry, what news he would want to know.
After she tells him about the baby and his mom and the business and how much she misses him she finally gets up and moves away.
